TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Typeface extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 、、 和 的组合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一种字体是相同的字体系列中某个字体的一个变体。A typeface is a single variation of a font within the same font family. 一种字体的示例是"Times New Roman"的字体系列的斜体版本。An example of a typeface is an italic version of the "Times New Roman" font family. 定义字体的粗细、 样式和的字体拉伸特征。Typeface defines the weight, style and stretching features of a font. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]

span.span: The font family that is used when a character is encountered that the primary font family (specified by the fontFamily parameter) cannot display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递`null`为`fallbackFontFamily`参数会导致主字体系列不包括的字符显示为方框字符。Passing `null` for the `fallbackFontFamily` parameter causes box characters to be displayed for characters not included in the primary font family. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#105)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#105)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CapsHeight As Double
public: property double CapsHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取从字样的基线到英语大写字母顶部的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter for the typeface.

value.span: 一个 ，指示从基线到英语大写字母顶部的距离，以字体 em 大小的一个分数表示。

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`1`指示英语大写字母的顶部是一个字体的基线，而返回的值 em`0.5`指示它是半字体 em 大小基线上的。A return value of `1` indicates that the top of an English capital letter is one font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.5` indicates that it is half a font em above the baseline.

span.span: Determines whether to simulate a bold weight for the glyphs represented by the .

value.span: 如果对标志符号应用粗体模仿，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if bold simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通过拉伸标志符号，可以模拟加粗的权重。A can simulate a bold weight by stretching a glyph. 通常，非模拟粗体字体旨在提供比模拟粗体字体更好的可视外观。A non-simulated bold typeface is typically designed to have a better visual appearance than a simulated bold typeface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsObliqueSimulated As Boolean
public: property bool IsObliqueSimulated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 确定是否模仿 所表示的标志符号的斜体样式。

span.span: Determines whether to simulate an italic style for the glyphs represented by the .

value.span: 如果对标志符号应用斜体模仿，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if italic simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通过扭曲或倾斜，标志符号，可以模拟斜体样式。A can simulate an italic style by shearing, or slanting, a glyph. 通常，非模仿的斜体字样旨在提供更好的可视外观比模拟的斜体字样。A non-simulated italic typeface is typically designed to have a better visual appearance than a simulated italic typeface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Stretch As FontStretch
public: property System::Windows::FontStretch Stretch { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

summary.span: 获取 的拉伸值。

span.span: Gets the stretch value for the .

summary.span: 拉伸值确定在显示字样时是扩展字样还是压缩字样。

span.span: The stretch value determines whether a typeface is expanded or condensed when it is displayed.

value.span: 一个表示字样拉伸值的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the stretch value for the typeface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体的拉伸值描述向其字体格式比拉伸的程度从其普通的纵横比，这是与高度之比指定的字体中的标志符号的原始宽度。A font stretch value describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#108)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StrikethroughPosition As Double
public: property double StrikethroughPosition { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从基线到字样删除线的距离。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.

value.span: 一个 ，指示从基线处测量并以字体 em 大小的一个分数表示的删除线位置。

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`0.1`表示带删除线位置字体 em 基线，而返回的值的 1 / 10`0.25`指示字体 em 基线其 1 / 4。A return value of `0.1` indicates that the strikethrough position is one-tenth of a font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.25` indicates that its one-fourth of a font em above the baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StrikethroughThickness As Double
public: property double StrikethroughThickness { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示删除线相对于字体 em 大小的宽度。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the strikethrough relative to the font em size.

value.span: 指示删除线粗细的 ，表示为字体 em 大小的一个分数。

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`0.05`表示带删除线宽度为一个-20 个的字体的全身大小，而返回的值的`0.1`表示带删除线宽度为的十分之一的字体的全身大小。A return value of `0.05` indicates that the strikethrough thickness is one-twentieth of the font em size, while a return value of `0.1` indicates that the strikethrough thickness is one-tenth of the font em size.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnderlinePosition As Double
public: property double UnderlinePosition { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示字样下划线与字样基线之间的距离。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the distance of the underline from the baseline for the typeface.

value.span: 一个 ，指示从基线处测量并以字体 em 大小的一个分数表示的下划线位置。

span.span: A that indicates the underline position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值通常为负，将基线下方下划线。The return value is usually negative, to place the underline below the baseline. 例如，返回值的`-0.1`指示下划线的位置是十分之一的字体 em 大小基线，而返回值的下方`-0.25`指示它是基线下方字体 em 大小的四分之一。For example, a return value of `-0.1` indicates that the underline position is one-tenth of a font em below the baseline, while a return value of `-0.25` indicates that it is one-fourth of a font em below the baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnderlineThickness As Double
public: property double UnderlineThickness { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示下划线相对于字样的字体 em 大小的宽度。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the underline relative to the font em size for the typeface.

value.span: 一个指示下划线宽度的 ，以字体 em 大小的一个分数表示。

span.span: A that indicates the underline thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`0.05`表示下划线宽度为一个-20 个的字体的全身大小，而返回的值的`0.1`指示下划线宽度是十分之一的字体的全身大小。A return value of `0.05` indicates that the underline thickness is one-twentieth of the font em size, while a return value of `0.1` indicates that the underline thickness is one-tenth of the font em size.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Weight As FontWeight
public: property System::Windows::FontWeight Weight { System::Windows::FontWeight get(); };

summary.span: 获取字样的相对粗细。

span.span: Gets the relative weight of the typeface.

value.span: 一个表示字样相对粗细的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the relative weight of the typeface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加的笔画或字样，相比与同一字样"正常"字符中的给定字符与关联的粗细通常区分粗细差异。Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness associated with a given character in a typeface, as compared to a "normal" character from that same typeface. **请注意**并非所有的权重是可用于所有字体。**Note** Not all weights are available for all typefaces. 不适用于一种字体粗细值时，则返回最接近的匹配权重。When a weight is not available for a typeface, the closest matching weight is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#110)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#110](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#110)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XHeight As Double
public: property double XHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取从字样基线到英语小写字母顶部的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English lowercase letter for a typeface.

summary.span: 此距离不包括升部。

span.span: The distance excludes ascenders.

value.span: 一个 ，指示从基线到英语小写字母顶部的距离（不包括升部），以字体 em 大小的一个分数表示。

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English lowercase letter (excluding ascenders), expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`0.25`指示一个英文字母的顶部是字体 em 基线，而返回值的大小的四分之一`0.75`指示一个英文字母的顶部是四分之三字体 em 基线。A return value of `0.25` indicates that the top of an English letter is one-fourth of a font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.75` indicates that the top of an English letter is three-fourths of a font em above the baseline.
